header_text: You made plans with a group of friends to go out to dinner on a Friday night. You see that they are dressed casually when they pick you up, but you think they might judge you because you dressed up a bit. You decide that you like what you're wearing and go to dinner happy.

elements.Text: Do you change your outfit because of what your friends are wearing?

elements.name: You made plans with a group of friends to go out to dinner on a Friday night.
